source:
import React from 'react'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, Line, PieChart, Pie, Cell } from 'recharts'; import Icon from '../../../components/AppIcon'; const DashboardOverview = ({ stats, analytics }) => { const statCards = [ { title: 'Total Projects', value: stats.projects, change: '+12%', changeType: 'positive', icon: 'FolderOpen', color: 'primary' }, { title: 'Blog Posts', value: stats.blogPosts, change: '+8%', changeType: 'positive', icon: 'BookOpen', color: 'secondary' }, { title: 'Hero Slides', value: stats.slides, change: '+3%', changeType: 'positive', icon: 'Image', color: 'accent' }, { title: 'Total Views', value: '24.7K', change: '+15%', changeType: 'positive', icon: 'Eye', color: 'success' } ]; const COLORS = ['#00FFFF', '#FF0080', '#39FF14', '#FFB000']; return (
{/* Header */}

Dashboard Overview

Welcome back, Mikael. Here's your content performance summary.

Last updated: {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}
{/* Stats Cards */}
{statCards.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.change}
{stat.value}
{stat.title}
))}
{/* Charts Section */}
{/* Visitor Analytics */}

Visitor Analytics

{/* Content Performance */}

Content Performance

{/* Recent Activity & Popular Content */}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{analytics.recentActivity.map((activity, index) => (
{activity.action}
{activity.timestamp}
))}
{/* Popular Content */}

Popular Content

{analytics.popularContent.map((entry, index) => ( ))}
{analytics.popularContent.map((item, index) => (
{item.name}
{item.value}%
))}
); }; export default DashboardOverview;

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import HeaderNavigation from '../../components/ui/HeaderNavigation'; import DynamicFooter from '../portfolio-home-hero/components/DynamicFooter'; import Icon from '../../components/AppIcon'; import Button from '../../components/ui/Button'; const Documentation = () => { const [currentTheme, setCurrentTheme] = useState('cyberpunk'); const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('overview'); useEffect(() => { // Get theme from localStorage const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'cyberpunk'; setCurrentTheme(savedTheme); }, []); const sections = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: 'Book' }, { id: 'api', label: 'API Reference', icon: 'Code' }, { id: 'usage', label: 'Usage Guide', icon: 'User' }, { id: 'examples', label: 'Examples', icon: 'FileText' }, ]; const renderOverview = () => (

Portfolio Platform Documentation

Welcome to the WisdomInTech portfolio platform documentation. This guide will help you understand how to use and extend the portfolio platform.

Quick Start

Get up and running with the portfolio platform in minutes.

API Reference

Explore the available API endpoints and their usage.

Platform Features

Image Projects
Video Projects
Logo Galleries
Blog System
File Uploads
Admin Dashboard
); const renderAPI = () => (

API Reference

The portfolio platform provides a RESTful API for managing content and retrieving data.

Projects API

GET /api/projects

Get all projects with optional filters

Query Parameters:
  • published - Filter by published status (true/false)
  • featured - Filter by featured status (true/false)
  • limit - Limit number of results (default: 100)
GET /api/projects/by-id?id={'{uuid}'}

Get a specific project by ID

POST /api/projects

Create a new project (requires authentication)

PUT /api/projects?id={'{uuid}'}

Update an existing project (requires authentication)

Settings API

GET /api/settings

Get site settings and configuration

PUT /api/settings

Update site settings (requires authentication)

Blog API

GET /api/blog

Get all blog posts

GET /api/blog/by-slug?slug={'{slug}'}

Get a specific blog post by slug

); const renderUsage = () => (

Usage Guide

Learn how to use the portfolio platform effectively.

Managing Projects

Creating Projects

  1. Navigate to the Admin Dashboard
  2. Click on "Projects Management"
  3. Click "New Project" button
  4. Fill in project details:
    • Title: Project name
    • Type: Choose from Image, Video, Gallery, or Logo Gallery
    • Description: Brief project description
    • Featured Image: Main project image
    • Technologies: Comma-separated list of technologies used
  5. Click "Create" to save the project

Project Types

Image Project

Standard project with a featured image and description.

Video Project

Project showcasing a video with optional poster image.

Image Gallery

Collection of images displayed in a grid layout.

Logo Gallery

Infinite scrolling carousel of logos and brand designs.

File Management

Supported File Types

Images

JPG, PNG, WebP, SVG

Videos

MP4, WebM, OGG

Documents

PDF, DOC, DOCX

Upload Guidelines

  • Keep file sizes under 10MB for optimal performance
  • Use descriptive filenames
  • Optimize images before uploading
  • For videos, provide a poster image for better UX
); const renderExamples = () => (

Examples

Practical examples of using the portfolio platform.

API Usage Examples

Fetch All Published Projects

{`fetch('/api/projects?published=true')
  .then(response => response.json())
  .then(projects => {
    console.log('Published projects:', projects);
  });`}

Get Featured Projects

{`fetch('/api/projects?featured=true&limit=6')
  .then(response => response.json())
  .then(projects => {
    console.log('Featured projects:', projects);
  });`}

Create a New Project

{`const projectData = {
  title: "My New Project",
  description: "A detailed description of the project",
  type: "image",
  featured_image: "https://example.com/image.jpg",
  tags: ["React", "Node.js"],
  status: "published"
};

fetch('/api/projects', {
  method: 'POST',
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'Authorization': 'Bearer YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN'
  },
  body: JSON.stringify(projectData)
})
.then(response => response.json())
.then(result => {
  console.log('Project created:', result);
});`}

Integration Examples

React Component Example

{`import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

const ProjectsList = () => {
  const [projects, setProjects] = useState([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);

  useEffect(() => {
    const fetchProjects = async () => {
      try {
        const response = await fetch('/api/projects?published=true');
        const data = await response.json();
        setProjects(data);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching projects:', error);
      } finally {
        setLoading(false);
      }
    };

    fetchProjects();
  }, []);

  if (loading) return 
Loading...
;

  return (
    

      {projects.map(project => (
        

          
{project.title}

          
{project.description}

          
        

      ))}
    

  );
};`}
); const renderContent = () => { switch (activeSection) { case 'api': return renderAPI(); case 'usage': return renderUsage(); case 'examples': return renderExamples(); default: return renderOverview(); } }; return (
Documentation - WisdomInTech Portfolio
{/* Sidebar Navigation */}
{sections.map((section) => ( ))}
{/* Main Content */}
{renderContent()}
); }; export default Documentation;

import React from 'react'; import Icon from '../../../components/AppIcon'; const SocialMediaGrid = ({ currentTheme }) => { const socialLinks = [ { name: "X (Twitter)", username: "@mikael_kraft", url: "https://x.com/mikael_kraft", icon: "Twitter", description: "Latest thoughts on tech, cybersecurity, and innovation", followers: "2.5K", color: currentTheme === 'light' ? 'text-black' : 'text-white', bgColor: currentTheme === 'light' ? 'bg-black' : 'bg-white/10' }, { name: "LinkedIn", username: "in/mikael-kraft", url: "https://linkedin.com/in/mikael-kraft", icon: "Linkedin", description: "Professional network and career updates", followers: "1.8K", color: currentTheme === 'light' ? 'text-blue-600' : 'text-blue-400', bgColor: currentTheme === 'light' ? 'bg-blue-600' : 'bg-blue-600/20' }, { name: "GitHub", username: "mikaelkraft", url: "https://github.com/mikaelkraft", icon: "Github", description: "Open source projects and code repositories", followers: "892", color: currentTheme === 'light' ? 'text-gray-800' : 'text-gray-300', bgColor: currentTheme === 'light' ? 'bg-gray-800' : 'bg-gray-800/20' } ]; const getThemeClasses = () => { switch(currentTheme) { case 'neural': return { bg: 'bg-purple-900/5', card: 'bg-purple-900/10 border-purple-500/20 hover:border-purple-400/40', text: 'text-purple-100', secondary: 'text-purple-300', accent: 'text-purple-400' }; case 'futuristic': return { bg: 'bg-slate-900/5', card: 'bg-slate-900/10 border-blue-400/20 hover:border-blue-300/40', text: 'text-blue-100', secondary: 'text-blue-300', accent: 'text-blue-400' }; case 'light': return { bg: 'bg-gray-50', card: 'bg-white border-gray-200 hover:border-gray-300 hover:shadow-lg', text: 'text-gray-900', secondary: 'text-gray-600', accent: 'text-blue-600' }; default: // cyberpunk return { bg: 'bg-background', card: 'bg-surface/30 border-primary/20 hover:border-primary/40 hover-glow-primary', text: 'text-text-primary', secondary: 'text-text-secondary', accent: 'text-primary' }; } }; const themeClasses = getThemeClasses(); return (
{/* Section Header */}

Connect With Me

Follow my journey across different platforms for updates, insights, and collaborations

{/* Social Media Grid */}
{socialLinks.map((social, index) => ( {/* Social Icon */}
{social.followers}
Followers
{/* Social Info */}

{social.name}

{social.username}

{social.description}

{/* Follow Button */}
Visit Profile
{/* Hover Effect Indicator */}
))}
{/* Contact CTA */}

Let's Collaborate

Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how we can work together to bring your ideas to life.

{/* Social Stats */}
5.2K
Total Followers
150+
Posts & Updates
25+
Open Source Repos
); }; export default SocialMediaGrid;
